pages.text: Invar is comparable to steel, sharing iron as a key component.$(br2)However, invar has much higher base durability and attack damage, making it ideal for weaponry. It pairs well with alloys that raise attack speed, such as $(l)$(l:material_titanium)titanium$()$(#808080)$(t:+2.5 Attack Speed)[?]$(), or even $(l)$(l:material_iron)iron$()$(#808080)$(t:x1.1 Attack Speed)[?]$().
